ai-mil3.6.5:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, please full ordination with Sundarī.”
ai-mil3.6.5:1.4_0: “But sir, is there any higher ordination or not?”
ai-mil3.6.5:1.5_0: “One who is fully ordained, great king, the Buddha’s knowledge has been given to the knowledge of all, and he lays down training rules for his disciples as long as he lives, does not want to live.”
